ModMetaData.name: RT Power Switch
ModMetaData.author: Ratys
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a new researchable (RT Mods research tab) function to the power switch: when enabled, the switch will automatically turn on when an adjacent powernet is about to run out of power, and turn off once the batteries are all full.
Available languages: - Chinese (simplified) (by duduluu) - Chinese (traditional) (by duduluu) - English - Russian - Spanish (Castilian) (by a kind stranger who wished to remain anonymous) - Spanish (Latin America) (by a kind stranger who wished to remain anonymous)
Refer to forum thread for additional information.
